EmailTemplate.name: Quotes Research Required - Case Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} Closed : {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please Note: Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} is now closed in our system as we did not receive the necessary data to support your request for quote.
If you still require a quotation, you can submit a request at www.myAerospace.com and provide below information:
- Cage Code, - Next Higher Assembly P/N, - End Item P/N, - Component Maintenance Manual, - Aircraft Model.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
